sentences.sentence: I look in the empty white ramie song ci.
sentences.translation: 日日望乡国，空歌白苎词。

sentences.sentence: Isunte ramie (linen, hemp) fibers resist solarization.
Thus, sodium hydroxide was used in this work for the pretreatment of ramie fiber.
sentences.translation: 因此，氢氧化钠是在这项工作中所使用的预处理苎麻纤维。
